start_desc.second: My name is Dominik and I am the creator of this website!

end_desc.first: I've always dreamed of becoming a programmer. About writing functional and clean code, about delivering useful solutions to people, and seeing them enjoy my products.
end_desc.second: I have been studying IT at the Warsaw University of Life Sciences since 2019. Since then, I have managed to gain some additional experience as an ERP system implementer.

inputs.email_info: We'll never share your email with anyone else.

whatufind.head: What you find on the site?

paragraf.first: It is a kind of portfolio that I created with the idea of advertising myself.
paragraf.second: This is one of my first 'non-tutorial' projects written entirely by myself.
paragraf.third: Here you will find basic information about me, the possibility of contacting me, as well as projects completed by me and (I hope) on which I am working.
